english_example_sentence: If you hadn't run away from the party, we would have chatted more.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы не убежали с вечеринки, мы бы поболтали подольше.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz partiden koşmamışsanız, daha çok sohbet ederdik.
